GeneDef.label: genetic converter
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that slowly convert those around them into a likeness of the carriers.

customEffectDescriptions.li: The target can be any <color=#8a8ae6>human</color> pawn under the player's control.
Every day, one of the pawns, with a different <color=#8a8ae6>germline</color> set, <color=#8a8ae6>loses</color> one of its old genes and gains one random caster gene.
After the <color=#8a8ae6>convert</color>, the xenotype and all genes of the target are <color=#8a8ae6>reset</color>, losing the accumulated information.
<color=#ff8585>Ignores targets that have this gene or conflict with it.</color>
